Class HDBManagerMenu

java.lang.Object
views.HDBManagerMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserController.PasswordChangeView
public class HDBManagerMenu extends Object implements UserController.PasswordChangeView
Handles the display and input for the HDB Manager user interface. Implements PasswordChangeView for the password change functionality.
